alert.note: Alert for Benton; Carroll; Madison; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 30 at 3:31AM CDT until October 30 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CDT THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM CDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27. For the second Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 expected. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Arkansas and east central, northeast and southeast Oklahoma. * WHEN...For the first Freeze Warning, until 9 AM CDT this morning. For the second Freeze Warning, from midnight tonight to 9 AM CDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...These conditions will kill plants and other tender vegetation that are left outdoors or unprotected. ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Even colder temperatures are expected Tuesday night with another widespread hard freeze across the region. Preparations should be made now for the sub-freezing temperatures.
info.instruction: Outdoor water pipes should be wrapped or drained. Precautions should also be taken to protect small plants and tender vegetation. Outdoor pets should have a warm...dry shelter with fresh water.
